documents.document: @ExorsusWoW congratulations to you all <3
@TheRoot We've crashed it :(
@HillaryClinton Don't give up, wait until every vote is counted. I believe in you <3
@WarcraftDevs @WatcherDev Forums are being wonky, keeps changing my character and errors posting.
@HeelvsBabyface I'm with you still <3 I would love to see what else is out there in the gaming world with you <3
Don't forget to check fellas <3 #inthenipoftime https://t.co/3rUNKnGEgS
I remember when he killed me :) https://t.co/W7AgjJDLCN
@WatcherDev Thank you <3 Babylonia 110 BM Hunter US Kirin Tor
@PreachGaming Yes, I would love you to do a guide for frost mages please <3

@WatcherDev congrats on the promotion <3
@WatcherDev If it's not too much trouble, can you ask Ornyx to please return to the hunter forum thread he started and engage with us please
I posted 4 photos on Facebook in the album "Duke Ellington School of the Arts" https://t.co/qKUvofAkN2
yes it should be uniform among the schools both public and charter. https://t.co/sHaMSGF8Oy
@HeelvsBabyface I don't like that profession progression involves dungeons. Why should I be forced to do content I'm not interested in :(
@Justinmccray87 I'm on Kirin Tor US, what server are you on? Sent you a private message also :)
@Justinmccray87 @JasonHayesMusic Katie has done a little cello as well. Right now in school, she's doing piano theory along with violin!
@JasonHayesMusic Katie spent today with her new music having a blast! Thanks again <3
@JasonHayesMusic AWESOME <3 thanks so much :)
@JasonHayesMusic Katie wants to know if there are any violin sheet music available for WOW to purchase? I didn't see any in the store.
@EliotHine The pic of the graduating class in front of the school in their caps and gowns
@EliotHine How do parents get this pic?
@HeelvsBabyface I'm ready now. Bring on the Legion! #FORAZEROTH
@WatcherDev There were tears. I'm 51 and I sobbed like a baby for the Alliance. I was truly broken at the Broken Shore. Well done <3
YAY!!! and can't wait for demon hunters <3 https://t.co/sDbMbbWyvf
I probably should not let my daughter see this lol https://t.co/E2xsdJwK3m
@Muffinus I'm a BM hunter and I'm not sure how I feel about the changes. I'm gonna play some more and get back to you.
How precious, congratulations <3 https://t.co/zMmQxc6alu
@HeelvsBabyface I hope you do a patch notes video for 7.0 because I am so unhappy. Also BM seems totally ruined now :(
@HeelvsBabyface Can you do the treasure chest scenario with a party?
This could be fun, either way I'm on board for Legion! https://t.co/QlcIG3APLJ

Attention Eliot Hine parents:
There will be no PTO meeting on Wednesday, June 8th. Look forward to information... https://t.co/y2ZVrU1dZU
@arpedrio @JasonHayesMusic It just pumps you up and lifts your spirit, you feel like you can do anything :)
@JasonHayesMusic @arpedrio My daughter plays violin and likes to try to learn music from WOW by ear, she loves the music in the elven areas.
@JasonHayesMusic My favorite piece is still the music for the opening cinematic of World of Warcraft, I still get goosebumps <3
@JasonHayesMusic Are you responsible for all the awesome music in game and on the soundtracks?
wait, there's a book and here I was just living my life https://t.co/t9Y9a1nkjY
@cpt_ass How are you feeling about the legion beta now?
@NBCTheVoice The talent was so awesome and inspiring this season, can't wait to see what happens next season. #BestShowEver
How awesome is that, it pays to continue to hold out for me https://t.co/MeKRdx7Voa

@cpt_ass @HeelvsBabyface Good luck on heroic :) Aiming for Mythic as well?

@cw_spn Don't see how you can possibly wrap up this storyline #mindblown
